name: Kutsu
description:
There's something wrong happening at your school recently. You decide to go see for yourself.

Judge's Choice for McGameJam 2019

By Jinfan, Eddie, Joanna, Yu-Chen, Aidi

Sounds from freesounds.org

Gamebreaking bug: 

- do not leave the piano without having solved the puzzle. The door will never unlock.

Hints:

-  books = shoes
